content.value: We sat down with Jeffrey Berwick to discuss the future of finance and how it could be guided. Listen to how crypto is changing the game and learn about the history and basic principles of anarchism.

Anarcho-Capitalist.  Libertarian.  Freedom fighter against mankind’s two biggest enemies, the State and the Central Banks.  Jeff Berwick is the founder of The Dollar Vigilante and host of the popular video podcast, Anarchast.  Jeff is a prominent speaker at many of the world’s freedom, investment and cryptocurrency conferences including his own, Anarchapulco, as well as regularly in the media including CNBC, Bloomberg and Fox Business.  Jeff also posts exclusive content daily to the new blockchain based social media network, Steemit.
"I think that if enough people understood what's really going on, I think a lot of people would walk away from 'the system'."

episodes.name: Jeffrey Tucker
episodes.position: Editorial Dir. and VP of American Institute for Economic Research

content.value: Jeffrey Tucker explained his overarching theory of knowledge with regards to economy, government, and, of course, cryptocurrency. Hear his opinion on the past and future of technology and society in this episode of WYS.

Jeffrey Tucker is a former Director of Content for the Foundation for Economic Education. He is the Editorial Director at the American Institute for Economic Research, a managing partner of Vellum Capital, the founder of Liberty.me, Distinguished Honorary Member of Mises Brazil, economics adviser to FreeSociety.com, research fellow at the Acton Institute, policy adviser of the Heartland Institute, founder of the CryptoCurrency Conference, member of the editorial board of the Molinari Review, an advisor to the blockchain application builder Factom, and author of five books.
"When the narrative of history takes an unexpected course... that delights me."
We talked with Nadav Hollander about the history of the financial system and the current crypto-backed lending space. He discusses his vision for fintech organizations and hope for a better world.
Nadav Hollander is Founder and CEO of Dharma.io, a decentralized credit company.
"Fundamentally... we need to invent entirely new paradigms for user experiences."

episodes.name: Tatiana Moroz
episodes.position: Founder of Tatiana Coin and Crypto Media Hub

content.value: We talked with artist and crypto influencer, Tatiana Moroz. She explained the basic principles and benefits of her cryptocurrency, Tatiana Coin, and showed us the positive effect women and artists are having on the blockchain space.

Tatiana Moroz is a soulful and outspoken singer-songwriter, and one of the pioneering artists in the Bitcoin and activist communities.
Following the release of several independently produced LPs, EPs and singles, Tatiana’s album Keep The Faith was released in 2017 having been funded with cryptocurrency. Her music is a fresh take on the folk style of the revolutionary 60’s and 70’s, an original blend of pop, rock, blues, and alt country.

Tatiana is the creator of TatianaCoin, the world’s first ever artist cryptocurrency. Tatiana Coin and other artist coins allow for connecting fans to artists for direct sales, engagement, and special experiences uniquely enabled by blockchain tech that can create a peer to peer ecosystem. A driving force in the industry, she is also the Founder of Crypto Media Hub, a PR, marketing and advertising agency for the Bitcoin space and beyond. “The Tatiana Show” podcast streams on several outlets including the Let’s Talk Bitcoin network and is quickly growing.
"If you work at a bank, you can't talk about the revolution you can start with a cryptocurrency."
